author: Simon Difford
description: Light rum, aromatic wine served 'up' with the marzipan and almond notes of apricot liqueur. I've used dry vermouth in place of the Kina Lillet in the 1930 recipe.
name: Culross Cocktail
recipeIngredient: 30 ml White (charcoal-filtered) 1-4 year old light rum
30 ml Lillet Blanc (or other aromatized wine)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
